content.raw:
OK. `excel-tab` is slightly different from just setting `delimiter` but probably just setting `delimiter` is better? Nonetheless this needs to be a new minor version, not just a bugfix since it could potentially break something.

Needs `NEWS`. Also the minor comment I made below. Eric can approve the revision.
